description: Connect your Google account to browse and manage calendars and events. Create, update, and delete single, recurring, or all-day events. Find events across calendars and keep schedules in sync.

refreshToken.description: Optional: Pre-existing refresh token for Google Calendar access

capabilities.name: authenticate
capabilities.description: Automatically authenticate with Google Calendar using OAuth 2.1 with popup support

capabilities.name: check_authentication
capabilities.description: Check if you are already authenticated with Google Calendar via Smithery

capabilities.name: start_manual_auth
capabilities.description: Start manual OAuth authentication if Smithery OAuth is not available

capabilities.name: exchange_auth_code
capabilities.description: Exchange authorization code for access and refresh tokens. Use this after user has authorized via the OAuth URL.

capabilities.name: complete_authentication
capabilities.description: Complete OAuth 2.1 authentication using authorization code from callback

capabilities.name: check_auth_status
capabilities.description: Check the current authentication status and token information

capabilities.name: list_calendars
capabilities.description: List all calendars accessible to the user

capabilities.name: manage_calendars
capabilities.description: Create, get details, update, or delete calendars

capabilities.name: get_current_time
capabilities.description: Get the current system date and time for creating events

capabilities.name: create_events
capabilities.description: Create single, multiple, or recurring calendar events

capabilities.name: list_events
capabilities.description: List events from a calendar with optional filtering and search

capabilities.name: update_events
capabilities.description: Update or delete calendar events by ID, name, or search criteria
